item.title: G. Kumar Naik chairs DISHA meeting in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[G. Kumar Naik, Raichur Lok Sabha MP, reviewed the progress of development works under the Central Fund at the District Development Coordination and Monitoring Committee (DISHA) meeting in Raichur on February 21.
He chaired the meeting to ensure effective implementation of Union, State, and local government schemes.
Issues related to agriculture, rural infrastructure development, railway projects, telecommunication, construction of schools, hostels, multi-village drinking water schemes, the Jal...]]>
